page.title: 13THORNBURY INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: Three examples of larger employers A Warehouse and Distribution Company. This company employs 50 people as drivers, office staff, warehouse men,fitters and security guards.Their job is to distribute goods such as wines, spirits, food, cleaning things and toiletries to a chain of supermarkets in the south west.This area stretches from Oxford to Cornwall and South Wales. An Optical Industry. 200 people are employed making plastic lenses for spectacles, the frames are imported from France.It is a French owned company. A Dairy Industry. This is a milk processing plant.80 people work there.The milk is brought here from the farms and then pasteurised, bottled and delivered to homes and shops.
